definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:MaxPlayerMana</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:MaxPlayerMana</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field
